section.name: Prerequisites
section.p: You must have Astah Community/Pro 6.7 or later already installed on your computer. Please go to Astah website to set it up.

ol.li: Download the latest version of any<code/> from Sourceforge Project Page.
Move or copy the downloaded .jar file in the "plugins" folder under Astah Installation folder.
Run Astah and click on Help > Plugin list... Plugin should appear on the list with a valid state and it should be enabled.
Done. Now create a project or open an existing one. any<code/> panel appears below the main diagram area.
